AutoHotkey Popup Scripts

Download hotkey-triggered popups for instant access to POE guides and tools

Download Package

What You Get:

  • ‚Ä¢POE Web Overlay script (poe-web-overlay.ahk)
  • ‚Ä¢Uses WebView2 for modern web-based overlays
  • ‚Ä¢Built-in content for all major POE activities
  • ‚Ä¢Dynamic configuration from remote server
  • ‚Ä¢Default hotkeys F1-F5 for instant access

Requirements:

  • ‚Ä¢ AutoHotkey v2.0+ installed
  • ‚Ä¢ Windows 10/11 (WebView2 Runtime)
  • ‚Ä¢ Required libraries from ahk2_lib GitHub repo
  • ‚Ä¢ Internet connection for initial setup
Download Setup Guide ‚Üí

Installation Guide

Step 1: Install AutoHotkey

Download and install AutoHotkey from the official website:

Download AutoHotkey

Step 2: Setup Libraries

  1. Download the POE Web Overlay script above
  2. Create a 'Lib' folder next to the script
  3. Download libraries from: thqby/ahk2_lib
  4. Extract WebView2/ and ComVar.ahk to the Lib folder

Step 3: Run & Test

  1. Double-click the .ahk file to run it
  2. Press F1 for Leveling Guide overlay
  3. Press F2 for Atlas Guide overlay
  4. Press Ctrl+Alt+H for help and all hotkeys
  5. Press Ctrl+Alt+M to enter Move Mode for repositioning

Step 4: Position Overlays

Use Move Mode to position overlays exactly where you want them:

  1. Press Ctrl+Alt+M to enter Move Mode
  2. Drag overlays to desired positions
  3. Press Ctrl+Alt+M again to save positions

Support & Customization

Default Hotkeys

  • F1 - Leveling Guide
  • F2 - Atlas Guide
  • F3 - Boot Search
  • F4 - Trading Tools
  • F5 - Currency Recipes
  • Ctrl+Alt+H - Show Help
  • Ctrl+Alt+R - Reload Script
  • Ctrl+Alt+M - Toggle Move Mode

Troubleshooting

  • ‚Ä¢ Ensure AutoHotkey v2.0+ is installed
  • ‚Ä¢ Check WebView2 Runtime is installed
  • ‚Ä¢ Verify Lib folder structure is correct
  • ‚Ä¢ Ensure internet connection works
  • ‚Ä¢ Run as administrator if needed
  • ‚Ä¢ Check Windows antivirus settings

Features

  • ‚Ä¢ Web-based overlays with modern UI
  • ‚Ä¢ Draggable positioning with Move Mode
  • ‚Ä¢ Auto-saves overlay positions
  • ‚Ä¢ Dynamic content from server
  • ‚Ä¢ Transparent overlays when not in Move Mode
  • ‚Ä¢ Always-on-top for easy access
